name: Lisa Phinney
summary: Operations professional with over 10 years of experience in administration, project coordination, event planning, and communications. Proficient in MS Office, Google Suite, CRM/PM tools (Asana, Basecamp), social media management, website updates, budgeting, vendor relations, and executive support.

experience.title: Operations Associate
experience.description: Responsible for administrative and operational tasks; coordinating projects; leadership liaison; vendor relationships; travel planning for a team of eight; budgeting; social media management; website updates; scheduling meetings via Zoom and GoToMeeting; event planning and execution; and providing executive support to co-leaders of Plenty Consulting.

experience.title: Assistant to the Executive Director
experience.description: Assist the Executive Director with administrative management; communicate with Historic Park City merchants; coordinate events with City staff; maintain Main Street directory map and kiosks; write minutes; promote HPCA website; grant reconciliation and budget management.

experience.title: Marketing Coordinator
experience.description: Maintain HPCA website calendar/events; blog updates; social media marketing; advertising campaigns; event planning and execution (Autumn Aloft, Halloween on Main, The Electric Parade).

experience.title: Fieldhouse Manager & Zumba Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Provided administrative support and excellent customer service; planned and executed annual events (Kids Carnival, Monster Ball, Color Run, Christmas); developed Zumba fitness program and built a community of students.
